title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the RFCImpactVisualizer tool, including the types of systems and departments to be covered, the desired visualization formats, and the expected user interactions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the RFCImpactVisualizer tool, including the data models, APIs, and user interfaces.

title: Develop Data Integration Components
description: Implement components to integrate data from various systems and departments into a unified data model for impact visualization.

title: Implement Visualization Engine
description: Develop the core visualization engine that generates visual representations of the potential impacts based on the integrated data.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the RFCImpactVisualizer tool, including user interactions, navigation, and configuration options.

title: Integrate Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure data privacy and access control for the RFCImpactVisualizer tool.

title: Set up Testing and Deployment Infrastructure
description: Establish the testing and deployment infrastructure for the RFCImpactVisualizer tool, including continuous integration, automated testing, and deployment pipelines.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the RFCImpactVisualizer tool, including user guides, technical specifications, and maintenance instructions.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Plan and execute user acceptance testing for the RFCImpactVisualizer tool, involving stakeholders from various systems and departments.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the RFCImpactVisualizer tool to the production environment and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms for ongoing maintenance and support.
